message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product for a price that I think is very reasonable considering its worth to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $16000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm counteroffering $14500 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
